- "Best USDC yields" â†’ https://www.defi.garden/?token=USDC
- "USDC yields on Base" â†’ https://www.defi.garden/?token=USDC&chain=Base
- "Ethereum lending" â†’ https://www.defi.garden/?chain=Ethereum&poolTypes=Lending
- "Pendle opportunities" â†’ https://www.defi.garden/?search=Pendle
- "High APY staking" â†’ https://www.defi.garden/?poolTypes=Staking&minApy=10

- "Arbitrum LP tokens" â†’ https://www.defi.garden/?chain=Arbitrum&poolTypes=LP%2FDEX
- "High TVL pools" â†’ https://www.defi.garden/?minTvl=10000000
